definition: official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
slot within a schedule/timeslot (for a TV program, a session with a photographer etc)/range of dates in which an event is to be held (film screening, exhibition etc)
low-grade/of low worth or rank/poor quality/inferior
gap (between two objects)/interval of time (between events)/opening in one's schedule/free time/(fig.) gap (in the market etc)
to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
sold out/to be out of stock
to file away/to place on file

sentences.english: Life is like a ten-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
sentences.chinese: 人生如同变速自行车，很多档，很多人都不曾用过。

sentences.english: Party leaders have ensured that the ACFTU has a monopolist position.
sentences.chinese: 档的领导人保证全总工拥有垄断地位。

sentences.english: All back rise seams should be two-thread chain stitch or double row lock stitch.
sentences.chinese: 所有后档缝应当用双针链式缝迹或双行锁式线迹。

sentences.english: No special handing for a missing end of line marker at the end of the file is provided.
sentences.chinese: 对于档结尾缺少的行尾标记，不提供特殊的处理。

sentences.english: On the new year's films, which film is the most harmonious one?
sentences.chinese: 透视今年贺岁档，哪部影片最“和谐”？

sentences.english: He shifted into low gear. The two vehicles began to decelerate.
sentences.chinese: 他换上低速档，两辆车开始减速了。

sentences.english: He's the Dean of Admissions for the University of Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 他是密歇根大学档招生办主任。

sentences.english: The new 7-speed DSG represents the next stage in the development of dual-clutch technology.
sentences.chinese: 新7档DSG展现了双离合器技术发展的下一个阶段。

sentences.english: Today, brother and sister team Jim and Rosemary steer Oyster Bay.
sentences.chinese: 现在吉姆与罗丝玛丽兄妹档管理蚝湾。

sentences.english: On using heavy oil, put the transfer switch 2K to heavy oil shelve .
sentences.chinese: 当使用重油时，将转换开关2K扳到重油档。

sentences.english: At a notice that I could do with her no longer intercepting my light, she removed to the hearthstone.
sentences.chinese: 当我对她说不要再档我的亮时，她就挪到炉边上去了。

sentences.english: Lunar New Year stalls in the domestic schedule in several schedule really is gold.
sentences.chinese: 贺岁档在国内几大档期中确实属于黄金档期。

sentences.english: On using diesel oil, put the transfer switch 2K to diesel oil shelve.
sentences.chinese: 当使用轻油时，将转换开关2K扳到轻油档。

sentences.english: The stand-alone redistributable packages contain all the components that are required to deploy the .
sentences.chinese: 但是，这些可执行档不包含语言套件。

sentences.english: There were not less than a hundred rounds in this perpendicular height of eighty feet.
sentences.chinese: 在八十英尺的垂直高度上，至少有一百档梯阶。

sentences.english: Use cruise control and overdrive gear.
sentences.chinese: 使用定速控制和超速档。

definition: slot within a schedule/timeslot (for a TV program, a session with a photographer etc)/range of dates in which an event is to be held (film screening, exhibition etc)
to transfer a dossier/to consult a dossier
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
(in a manual car) gear (i.e. reverse, neutral, 1st, 2nd etc)/(automatic car) transmission mode (P, R, N, D etc)/(electric fan etc) speed setting
to broadcast through satellite/satellite (TV etc)/shangxing acupoint (DU23)
to start an engine/to boot up (a computer)/to press Ctrl-Alt-Delete/to begin shooting a film or TV show
